title: 【跟风+1】你们是喜欢菠萝还是喜欢凤梨？
author: 底层咸鱼
txt_content:
本帖最后由 897412176 于 2019-8-5 12:29 编辑 

（还是喜欢海绵宝宝）



[media]https://www.bilibili.com/video/av8420635/[/media]

The Pirate and Kids
Captain: Are ya ready kids?
Kids: Aye Aye Captain.
Captain: I can't hear you.
Kids: Aye Aye Captain!
Captain: OHHHHHHH, Who lives in a pineapple under the sea?
Kids: SpongeBob SquarePants!
Captain: Absorbent and yellow and porous is he!
Kids: SpongeBob SquarePants!
Captain: If nautical nonsense be something you wish,
Kids: SpongeBob SquarePants!
Captain: Then drop on the deck and flop like a fish!
Kids: SpongeBob SquarePants!
Captain: Ready?
Captain and Kids: SpongeBob SquarePants, SpongeBob SquarePants, SpongeBob SquarePants!
Captain: SpongeBob SquarePaaaaannttss!!! HA HA HA HA!!!!

水完贴赶紧（跑

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 我能考诉你菠萝和凤梨是一种作物吗，只不过菠萝带刺，凤梨长得好看不带刺卖的贵

replies.author: 底层咸鱼
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 897412176 于 2019-8-5 09:02 编辑 
小阿狸.... 发表于 2019-8-5 08:46
我能考诉你菠萝和凤梨是一种作物吗，只不过菠萝带刺，凤梨长得好看不带刺卖的贵 ...
之前论坛里不是有人问：
土豆和马铃薯
番茄和西红柿
极光和阴阳师
我只是来跟个风
（凤梨不应该是菠萝的学名吗

replies.author: tamashii
replies.txt_content: 没有海绵宝宝选项差评！
